snippet: Prosecutors said Mary Evans would approach the victims in Upper Manhattan, gain their trust and then scam them.
abstract: Prosecutors indict Manhattan woman Mary Evans on charges including grand larceny for stealing more than $400,000 from three older men since 2009.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Mary Evans would approach the victims in Upper Manhattan, gain their trust and then scam them.

headline.main: Woman Charged With Tricking Men Into Giving Her Cash
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged  With Tricking Men  Out of Their Cash
